citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:20am on May 5th,
2023. Inspectors called primary contact number on arrival at facility at 8:20am, left message requesting a call back. Rang
doorbell; no responsible adult available. Called primary contact number again at 8:45am. No response received from
registrant within 30 minutes of arrival.
Additional Inspectors:
SARA TOBIAS, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 8:20am on May 5th, 
2023. Inspectors called primary contact number on arrival at facility at 8:20am, left message requesting a call back. Rang 
doorbell; no responsible adult available. Called primary contact number again at 8:45am. No response received from 
registrant within 30 minutes of arrival. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
SARA TOBIAS, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
